name: PowerBI.Import
description: Import a file to a Power BI workspace.
author: bguidinger

inputs.name: WorkspaceId
inputs.label: Workspace ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional: If not specified, your personal workspace will be used.

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the file or folder to import.

inputs.name: Conflict
inputs.label: Conflict
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines what to do if a file with the same name already exists.

inputs.name: ConnectionStrings
inputs.label: Connection Strings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection strings to replace in the .rdl files.
